name: Unwanted (XPS)
description:
"You've been here before..."

- "..."

-"Do you remember?"

Good afternoon adventurers. I present to your attention a new game in the RPG genre.

This is my first RPG Maker mv project.

The path of creation was long and thorny, but in the end the game was ready.

Even if it's only 1 chapter.

I'm planning 2 more full chapters, but it's up to you. If you like the game, please

leave a comment. This will give me a reason and motivation to continue the story.

Chapter 1 tells about one adventurer who somehow gets into the world of fantasy.

In your adventures you will meet many different characters, both good and bad.

Help Abigail get to the college. But be careful. Trouble lurks around every corner...

I hope you enjoy this story and leave a review.

Good game!
